import {IAttributes, IAugmentedJQuery, IDirective, IScope} from "angular";
import IfShowController from "./ifShow-controller";
 
/**
 * @ngdoc directive
 * @name xui.directive:xuiIfShow
 * @restrict E
 *
 * @description
 * Convenience directive for combining ng-if & ng-show.
 */
 
/**
 * Xui ifShow directive
 */
export default class IfShowDirective implements IDirective {
    public static $inject: string[] = [];
 
    public restrict = "E";
    public templateUrl = "xui/components/ifShow/ifShow-directive.html";
    public replace = true;
    public transclude = true;
    public controller = IfShowController;
    public scope = {};
    public controllerAs = "vm";
    public bindToController = {
        visible: "<"
    };
}
 
/**
 * If-show directive scope
 *
 * @interface
 */
export interface IIfShowDirectiveScope extends IScope {
    /**
     * Indicator whether content is visible in string form
     */
    visible?: boolean;
}
